title: What are some examples of existential value? - Quora

response.answer_text: Ooh, this is a fun one. Well, the world is all going to rot away, everyone I know will die, I will die too, and I can’t even verify if I am real or not. There are a million permutations for how I might die, there are a million different ways for how painful my death might be, and all the while, people are going about their daily lives as if nothing is going on in my head. I can’t verify if other people exist, in which case this world is incredibly lonely. If I cannot predict whether or not I will succeed in my major, why should I try at all? To quote Nietzsche: “I saw two men. One the greatest of all men, the other the least of all men. They were both utterly naked.”
